column1: substantiate the loss that he suffered, if any, and in such a situation, the CAA
will not be in a position to quantify the loss.

I
n  the  above  circumstances,  this  Court  issues  a  Writ  of  Certiorari  quashing
‘P17’, and a Writ of Certiorari quashing the findings in ‘P18’ that the Petitioner
should replace the vehicle sold to the 3rd Respondent.

T
     
his Court makes no order with regard to costs.
Judge of the Court of Appeal
